## ==That frustration with traditional schooling? Einstein felt it too. Here's what the world's greatest genius can teach us about how kids really learn...==

==Welcome back to the weekly edition of OpenEd Daily!==

==Outschool, unschool, deschool, preschool... However your family chooses to learn, we've got something cool!==

==Our friends at== [==Outschool==](http://outschool.com/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=102-albert-einstein-on-his-school-and-education-system) ==are offering OpenEd families 20% off all classes and tutoring (up to $40 off). Just use code OPENED20 at checkout. Works for both new and returning families, and the offer's good through January 31st.==

### ==üí°THE BIG IDEA==

## ==**‚ÄòMy kid hates learning.‚Äô**==

==Your kid doesn't hate learning. They probably never did. They just know ‚Äì like Albert Einstein did ‚Äì that there's a better way.==

==When Einstein wrote about his early schooling, he didn't mince words:==

==‚ùù==

=="The teachers behaved like sergeants.== ==_**I wanted to learn what I wanted to know, but they wanted me to learn for the exam**_====... I felt that my thirst for knowledge was being strangled."==

==Albert Einstein==

==More than 100 hundred years later, the same system Einstein suffered under is still the norm. That's why so many of us are choosing a different path. We‚Äôve seen that same thirst for knowledge in our kids and refused to let it be strangled.==

### ==üìä TRENDS WE‚ÄôRE WATCHING==

- [==Tennessee public school goes hybrid==](https://www.the74million.org/article/what-happens-when-public-school-districts-embrace-hybrid-schools/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=098-what-einstein-actually-said-about-school)==: One day in-person, four days home (90%+ teacher satisfaction) (The 74 Million)==
- [==Dad‚Äôs reimagining home-based education==](https://classicalconversations.com/blog/homeschooling-from-a-dad-to-a-dad/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=101-when-builders-become-architects) ==(Classical Conversations)==
- [==Physical books holding strong in digital age==](https://x.com/AdamMGrant/status/1866147480779239536?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1866147480779239536%7Ctwgr%5Ec0e7dcdb4c035d0ce128c5dc9c3bccb5cbafb99a%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fopened-daily.beehiiv.com%2Fp%2F099-your-child-doesn-t-hate-learning-here-s-what-s-really-going-on&utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=102-albert-einstein-on-his-school-and-education-system) ==(h/t to Adam Grant)==
